sentences.en: A similar show goes each year to Lausanne too.
sentences.cn: 每年在洛桑的相似表演也是如此.

sentences.en: After we leave Lausanne , we directly tale the train to Geneva.
sentences.cn: 在离开洛桑之后我们直接上火车就来到了日内瓦.

sentences.en: Hop on and travel to the charming city of Lausanne.
sentences.cn: 迈步登上火轮,到迷人的城市洛桑观光旅游.

sentences.en: Kochhar is in charge of metabolism research at the Nestle Research Center in Lausanne, Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 科克哈尔目前在瑞士洛桑雀巢研究中心负责生物新陈代谢的研究.

sentences.en: Located in Lausanne , only 40 minutes by train from Geneva Lausanne.
sentences.cn: 从日内瓦前往洛桑乘坐火车只需40分钟.

sentences.en: Located in Lausanne, only 40 minutes by train from Geneva to Lausanne.
sentences.cn: 位于洛桑市内.从日内瓦前往洛桑乘坐火车只需40分钟.

sentences.en: Major Cities: Zurich, Basel, Geneva, Bern, Lausanne, Winterthur, Lucerne, Bienne, Thun.
sentences.cn: 主要城市: 苏黎世, 巴塞尔, 日内瓦, 伯尔尼, 洛桑, 温特图尔, 卢塞恩, 比安, 图恩.

sentences.en: The cities of Basel and Lausanne are also important manufacturing centres.
sentences.cn: 巴塞尔和洛桑两城也是瑞士重要的制造中心.

sentences.en: The IOC, Based in Lausanne , Switzerland, is the ruling body of the Olympic Movement.
sentences.cn: 总部设在瑞士洛桑的国际奥委会是奥林匹克运动的领导机构.

sentences.en: The Universal Assembly will be held in early September in Lausanne, Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 万国会议将于9月初在瑞士洛桑召开.

sentences.en: Well, he was still helping her a year later, then; for somebody met 'em living at Lausanne together.
sentences.cn: 可一年之后他仍然在继续帮助她呢。 有人在洛桑亲眼看见他们住在一起。

sentences.en: You can visit Geneva, Nyon , Lausanne, Montreux, Interlaken ( Jung Frau Mountain, the top of Europe ), Luzern, Bern.
sentences.cn: 你们可以去日内瓦 、 尼翁 、 洛桑 、 蒙特勒 、 因特拉肯 ( 少女山, 欧洲屋脊 ) 、 卢塞恩 、 伯尔尼等城市旅游.

trans.tran_cn: 洛桑（瑞士西部城市，在日内瓦湖北岸）
